p: In the present study, different combinations of input data were explored to assess their influence on the cholera disease. GT evaluated the best combination of the candidate inputs by Genetic Algorothim (GA). The parameters of GA to find good embedding were the population size (100 chromosomes), the mutation rate (0.01), the crossover rate (0.5), the gradient fitness (0.1), intercept fitness (0.8), and length fitness (0.1) [ 16]. The non-linear analysis and modeling tool which used to analyze the data was winGamma that developed by the Department of Computer Science, Cardiff University [ 29].
